metadata.title: CVE-2019-18677 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Squid 3.x and 4.x through 4.8 when the append_domain setting is used (because the appended characters do not properly interact with hostname length restrictions). Due to incorrect message processing, it can inappropriately redirect traffic to origins it should not be delivered to.

criterions.comment: squid package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9-2ubuntu1').
